content: colourful cow crochet pattern written crochet pattern by ella getting started hello thanks for picking up this pattern this is my first time writing a crochet pattern so if you have any suggestions/ notice any mistakes let me know this pattern uses us terminology so keep that in mind materials 4 mm crochet hook three different yarn colours of your choice ply of your choice darning needle stitch marker optional but highly recommended 2 safety eyes 7 5 mm this pattern is beginner friendly but requires difficulty knowledge of the following stitches… single_crochet single_crochet magic_ring magic_ring chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase increase decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch the yarn colours are labelled a b and c for example for my blue and white cow the colours were a white b light blue c dark blue selling your finished crochet products of this pattern is permitted however selling copies of this written pattern is not allowed pattern pattern for the head the head will be made in colour a yarn round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 increase single_crochet x 6 18 round 4 increase 2sc x 6 24 round 5 increase 3sc x 6 30 rounds 6-10 single_crochet around 30 round 11 decrease 3sc x 6 24 round 12 decrease 2sc x 6 18 round 13 decrease single_crochet x 6 12 insert safety eyes between row 8 and 9 stuff the head and fasten_off with a long tail for sewing don t sew the hole in the head shut pattern for the body the body will be made in colour a yarn round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 increase single_crochet x 6 18 round 4 increase 2sc x 6 24 round 5-14 single_crochet around 24 round 15 decrease 2sc x 6 18 round 16 decrease single_crochet x 6 12 stuff the body round 17 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off and sew shut pattern pattern for the legs make 4 the legs will start in colour c yarn round 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 single_crochet around switch to colour a yarn on the last stitch 12 round 4 single_crochet around in colour a yarn 12 once you ve made the snout details round 5 6sc half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet 3sc 12 snout use a darning needle fasten_off and leave long tail for sewing and colour c yarn insert darning needle from inside the snout to the outside pattern for the snout and back in a few stitches down do the same thing for the snout will be made in colour b yarn the other side here s a round 1 4sc in magic_ring 4 front picture of the snout for reference round 2 increase x 4 8 round 3 single_crochet 2hdc 2sc 2hdc single_crochet 8 slip_stitch into the first stitch of the next round fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing pattern for the horns make 2
